project.description: Run the benchmark tasks on the most recent dev or stg AMI. This set of tests can take from 20 to 30 hours to complete.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Delete the previous repo clone directories rm -rf li openshift-dev-tools
# Clone the repos git clone git@github.com:openshift/li.git git clone git@github.com:openshift/openshift-dev-tools.git
if [ -d "rhc/log" ]; then echo "Wiping out old build data..." rm -rf rhc/log/* fi
launch_params="" if [ "$use_stage_image" == "true" ] then launch_params=$launch_params" --use_stage_image" fi echo $launch_params
pushd li
# Launch a test instance build/devenv launch libra_benchmark_${BUILD_NUMBER} --verifier --instance_type $instance_type $launch_params
test_params="" if [ "$profile_broker" == "true" ] then test_params=$test_params" --profile-broker" fi echo $test_params
# Run the image tests build/devenv test libra_benchmark_${BUILD_NUMBER} --include_cucumber=benchmark --disable-charlie --mcollective-logs --terminate $test_params
popd
